subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Michael Pineda, who drew attention because of a substance on his hand in his last start, allowed four hits in six innings as the Yankees shut out the Cubs in the second game of a doubleheader.
snippet: Michael Pineda, who drew attention because of a substance on his hand in his last start, allowed four hits in six innings as the Yankees shut out the Cubs in the second game of a doubleheader.
